welcome_message_body: Welcome to Aurora, a charming city known for its beautiful parks, vibrant arts scene, and friendly community. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Aurora has to offer during your visit!

restaurants.name: Bar-Bill Tavern
restaurants.description: Bar-Bill Tavern is a wings joint located in East Aurora.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Arapahoe Co Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Arapahoe Co Airport is reserved for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Jeffco Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Jeffco Airport is reserved for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Erie Municipal Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Erie Municipal Airport is used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
